welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Velizy-Villacoublay, France! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and lively atmosphere. We invite you to discover all it has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The southern terminal of Orly Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: The western terminal of Orly Airport, serving mainly international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a wide range of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login or registration.
